alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 6:16PM EDT until August 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern New London County in southern Connecticut... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 616 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Voluntown to Lisbon to near Colchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Jewett City and Lisbon around 620 PM EDT. Griswold around 625 PM EDT. Lebanon and Sprague around 630 PM EDT. Preston around 640 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
